name: Burn the moon
description:
Evil aliens occupied the moon and prepared for the death shot to destroy the Earth.. The only chance to save humanity is the burn the moon on the Sun. With the unlucky planet.

Use gravitation of the two planets to push the third planet with the moon on its orbit to the Sun. Aliens are known about this plan so teleports their base (with the moon) to the farthest planet each turn. 

Every level is a unique puzzle. Move the planets to the right places until you can make the winning shot. Avoid obstacles. Try to save Mars too. Collect human artifacts to increase your score.
